tables.name: valsi
tables.schema: ++id, bangu, w, y, d, n, t, *s, g, *r, *cache, [r+bangu]

rows.w: lo'e nicte be lo cabna bei ti cu cacra li mu
rows.d: At this time and this place, night is 5 hours long.

rows.w: pu ku ca lo nu do mo'u klama vau mi ru'i cadzu lo srasu lo jamfu
rows.d: When you arrived I was walking on the grass on foot.

rows.w: mutce cafne fa lo nu mi vitke lo patfu be mi
rows.d: It's quite often that I visit my father.

rows.w: ti cagna lo pu se zvati be lo pa denci bu'u lo moklu be lo nakni ri'a lo nu lo mikce mo'u vimcu denci bu
rows.d: This is a wound in his mouth at the place where there was a tooth and caused by removal of the tooth by a doctor.

rows.w: mi nelci lo blabi cakla ne se mau lo manku cakla
rows.d: I prefer white chocolate to dark chocolate.

rows.w: mi nitcu tu'a su'o calku be lo stedu
rows.d: I need a head helmet.

rows.w: do canci lo jvinu be fi mi
rows.d: You disappeared from my view.

rows.w: mi zuk-cfu lo ka jai gau bredi fai lo cidja vau lo nu mi jai gau citka fai lo gerku pe mi
rows.d: I am busy preparing food to feed my dog.

rows.w: ti cange lo barda tumla lo mensi be mi lo van-jba
rows.d: This is a farm covering a large parcel of land; it's kept by my sister and produces grapes.

rows.w: e'u mi canja tu'a lo bidju lo ka jai gau zgana lo tatru be do fai mi vau do
rows.d: Let me give you these beads in exchange that you show me your breast.

rows.w: lo canko be lo karce cu kalri
rows.d: The window in the car is open.

rows.w: lo canlu be lo purdi cu barda
rows.d: The garden occupies a large space.

rows.w: ti canpa lo'e dertu ji lo'e snime
rows.d: Is this spade for digging ground or snow?

rows.w: mi pu zva-fa'i su'o prina be lo canre bei su'o jamfu
rows.d: I found some footprints in the sand.

rows.w: mi pu se nandu lo ka cadzu loi canre poi gunma lo cmalu rokci
rows.d: It was hard for me to walk on the sand made of small stones.

rows.w: ro da poi remna zo'u kanpe lo nu ba zi lo nu da co'a cifnu vau loi jurme co'a xabju lo canti be da
rows.d: For every human it is expected that soon after he is born bacteria colonize his intestines.

rows.w: mi sazri pa carce be lo'e karce
rows.d: I am driving a car transporter.

rows.w: ei do tsali lo ka tadni
rows.d: You should study hard.

rows.w: ti noi bombila cu carmi lo ka te gusni vau mi
rows.d: This light bulb to me gives a bright light.

rows.w: ko carna fi lo pritu
rows.d: Turn to the right.

rows.w: ko carna fi lo pritu
rows.d: Turn right.

rows.w: carna
rows.d: i ko carna lo kojna lo pritu

rows.w: ro da poi mokca lo xislu zo'u da go nai carna lo jendu lo pritu be ri bei mi gi'e galtu be mi bei lo jendu gi carna lo jendu lo zunle be ri bei mi gi'e dizlo be mi bei lo jendu
rows.d: The wheel was rotating around the rod counterclockwise when viewed from above.

rows.w: lo xislu pu ca'o ca'a carna lo grana
rows.d: The wheel was rotating around the rod.

rows.w: ti cartu pa fange tcadu lo dargu
rows.d: This is a map showing roads of an alien city.

rows.w: ko fai mi jai gau zgana lo cartu be lo nu'o se zvati be mi'o
rows.d: Show me a map of a place where you and I haven't been.

rows.w: ca ca'o carvi
rows.d: It's raining.

rows.w: lo snime pu carmi carvi lo lalxu pa barda dilnu
rows.d: It was snowing hard onto the lake from a large cloud.

rows.w: lo fetsi joi mi pu casnu pa arte
rows.d: She and I discussed a piece of art.

rows.w: ko jikca la'e me'o so pa pa
rows.d: Dial 911!

rows.w: lo nixli pu catke lo nanla re'o lo stedu be ri
rows.d: The girl pushed the boy on his head.

rows.w: ko catlu mi
rows.d: Look at me.

rows.w: mi co'a catni lo ka cange ti ce'u vau lo du'u lo patfu be mi cu e'ande mi lo se nei
rows.d: The authority to be a farmer on this land has been given to me by my father.

rows.w: lo nakni cu kakne lo ka catra se pi'o pa rokci re cipni
rows.d: He can kill two birds with one stone.

rows.w: ti noi lalxu cu caxno lo ka sraji vau lo sefta be vo'a
rows.d: This lake is shallow in separating its bottom from its surface.

rows.w: ti cecla lo fagri
rows.d: This is a fire gun.

rows.w: pa cecmu be lo cipni mo'u muvdu lo bu'u tcadu
rows.d: A colony of birds moved to this city.

rows.w: lo cabna cu cedra lo nu pilno lo skami
rows.d: These days are the era of using computers.

rows.w: do cenba lo ka cpedu ma kau vau lo barda
rows.d: Your demands vary to much degree.

rows.w: lo bu'u tcadu cu censa ro prenu pe vi
rows.d: This city is holy to all people here.

rows.w: ti noi tcadu cu centero lo te gugde
rows.d: This city is in the center of the country.

rows.w: lo insekto cu centi lo ka mitre vau lo ka clani
rows.d: The insect is 1 centimeter long.

rows.w: mi cerda lo ka ponse lo dinju vau lo patfu be mi su'o se djica be ri
rows.d: I inherited the house from my father according to his will.

rows.w: mi ba klama lo boske ca lo cer-murse be lo bav-lam-dei bei ti
rows.d: I will go to forest tomorrow at dawn at this place.

rows.w: ca cerni pa cnino la nipon
rows.d: It is now the morning of a new day in Japan.

rows.w: fau ei ro da mi se zu'e se marvele lo nu lo prenu se la'u li xo kau certu lo ka limna
rows.d: I cannot but wonder at his skill in swimming.

rows.w: do cevni mi lo nu carvi
rows.d: You are a god of rain for me.

rows.w: de'i li cy xo lo se tigni cu cfari
rows.d: At what time does the performance begin?

rows.w: la'e lu la lunra cu kusru turni li'u cfika lo logji bangu
rows.d: The Moon is a harsh mistress' is a fiction about logical languages.

rows.w: mi se cfila lo nu lo drata cu xanka
rows.d: I have my faults making other nervous.

rows.w: mi pu setca pa cfine lo loldi te zu'e lo nu lo vorme co'a kalri
rows.d: I drove a wedge into the floor so that the door was open.

rows.w: zo zabna jai cfipu mi fai lo ka se smuni
rows.d: To me {zabna} is confusing in meaning.

rows.w: do je'a xu se cfipu lo ka cuxna lo ka zukte ma kau
rows.d: Are you really confused of deciding what to do?

rows.w: lo ciblu be mi cu klesi li a bu ma'u bu
rows.d: My blood type is A positive.

rows.w: lo vanci tsani co'a cicna
rows.d: The evening sky became turquoise.

rows.w: lo rectu na cidja lo xirma
rows.d: Meat is not a food for horses.

rows.w: mi nelci lo jungo cidja
rows.d: I like Chinese food.

rows.w: lo cidni be lo tuple be mi cu se xrani
rows.d: My knee is injured.

rows.w: lo cidro cu traji linto se ratni
rows.d: Hydrogen is the lightest element.

rows.w: xu lo cifnu xa'o jimpe lo lojbo se smu-sku
rows.d: Does the infant understand Lojban yet?

rows.w: ti cigla lo xasne lo remna
rows.d: This human gland secrets sweat.

rows.w: xu su'o do cikna
rows.d: Is any of you awake?

rows.w: mi pu co'a clira cikna
rows.d: I got up early.

rows.w: ko jai gau cikna fai mi de'i li cy bi
rows.d: Wake me up at 8.

rows.w: mi cikre lo spofu stizu lo ka ka'e se zutse
rows.d: I repair the chair so that one can sit on it.

rows.w: mi pu ciksi fi lo ctuca fe lo nu mi na zvati lo nu penmi vau fo lo nu mi na pu djuno lo du'u sarcu fa lo nu mi zvati nu bu
rows.d: I explained to the teacher my absence at the meeting that I didn't know that I should've been there.

rows.w: ti noi foldi cu cilce
rows.d: This field is untamed.

rows.w: ra sazri pa cilce xirma
rows.d: He rides an untamed horse.

rows.w: ko lumci lo canko se pi'o lo cilmo bukpu
rows.d: Clean the window with a damp cloth.

rows.w: mi cilre fi la lojban
rows.d: I learn Lojban.

rows.w: mi pu cilre lo du'u lo remna na smani
rows.d: I learnt that humans are not monkeys.

rows.w: mi tcidu mu'i lo nu mi cilre
rows.d: I read in order to learn.

rows.w: mi pu katna lo cilta lo ci mei
rows.d: I cut the wire into three pieces.

rows.w: lo mitre be li re cu cimde lo kumfa lo ka clani
rows.d: Two meters is the dimension of the room in length.

rows.w: si'au lo nu penmi cu cimni lo ka se ditcu
rows.d: It seems to me, the meeting will never end.

rows.w: lo munje cu cimni lo ka se canlu
rows.d: The world is infinite in space.

rows.w: mi pu cinba lo fetsi re'o pa kerlo
rows.d: I kissed her in the ear.

rows.w: xu da cindu bu'u lo cmana
rows.d: Are there oak trees on the mountain?

rows.w: mi pu se spaji lo ka viska lo cinfo
rows.d: I was surprised to see a lion.

rows.w: da cinje lo bukpu
rows.d: There are creases in the cloth.

rows.w: gau ko ri xutla
rows.d: Smooth out it.

rows.w: lo insekto cu cinki
rows.d: Insects are arthropods.

rows.w: lo ninmu cu cinla lo ka se tuple
rows.d: The woman has thin legs.

rows.w: mi cinmo lo ka gleki vau lo nu mi'o tavla zu'ai bau la lojban
rows.d: I feel happy that we talk in Lojban.

rows.w: ma se cinri lo nu ca ma kau lo fetsi co'a speni
rows.d: Who cares when she gets married?

rows.w: mi se cinri lo nu xu kau sarcu fa lo nu mi cusku fi la alis fe lo se du'u mi pu zi zukte ma kau
rows.d: I wonder if I should tell Alice what I just did.

rows.w: mi pu punji lo cinta be lo kliti bei lo sovda lo bitmu
rows.d: I put an oil paint (with clay as a pigment) on to the wall.

rows.w: lo cintura be do cu klani ma lo ka clani
rows.d: What is the length of your waist?

rows.w: lo pa cipni ca'o vofli
rows.d: The bird is flying.

rows.w: lo nu catlu lo kanla be do cu cipra lo nu do stace se la'u li xo kau
rows.d: To look into your eyes is a test of your sincerity.

rows.w: mi cirko lo ka kakne lo ka sazri lo xirma vau lo ka xabju lo tcadu
rows.d: I lost my ability to ride a horse while living in the city.

rows.w: xu do djica tu'a lo cirla
rows.d: Would you like cheese?

rows.w: mi ba ciska lu coi munje li'u lo pelji
rows.d: I will write "Hello, world!" on the paper.

rows.w: se ja'e ma do cisma
rows.d: Why are you smiling?

rows.w: lo kibro cu ciste lo se tcana be lo skami poi se pi'o ce'u lo prenu cu jikca
rows.d: The internet is a system with computer nodes, using which people communicate.

rows.w: mi mo'u citka pa badna e re mango
rows.d: I've eaten a banana and two mangoes.

rows.w: lo nixli cu citno lo ka lifri lo xo kau mei
rows.d: The girl is young in how much she experienced.

rows.w: mi tadni lo citri be lo kagni bei lo cnino lanli
rows.d: I'm studying the history of the company according to new analysts.

rows.w: ca citsi lo nu carvi vau lo pa no no mu moi
rows.d: Now it's the season of rains of year 2005.

rows.w: xu lo civla be fi lo gerku cu ckape lo remna
rows.d: Are dog louses dangerous to humans?

rows.w: lo valsi cu cizra mi lo ka se smuni
rows.d: The word is strange to me in meaning.

rows.w: cizra fa lo nu la tom na zvati
rows.d: It's strange that Tom is not present.

rows.w: cizra fa lo nu la alis na zvati
rows.d: It's strange that Alice is not present.

rows.w: cizra fa lo nu la maris na zvati
rows.d: It's strange that Mary is not present.

rows.w: lo bolci poi ckabu cu plipe ri'a lo ka pruni
rows.d: A rubber ball jumps because it is elastic.

rows.w: do pinxe lo ckafi ji lo tcati
rows.d: Will you drink coffee or tea?

rows.w: lo prenu na simlu gi'e ku'i ja'a ckaji vau lo ka ninmu
rows.d: The person doesn't look like a woman but she is.

rows.w: lo ka masno bacru cu se ckaji tu noi nanmu
rows.d: Slow speech is the characteristic of that man.

rows.w: au mi vreta lo ckana
rows.d: I want to lie down in bed.

rows.w: ka'e ckape lo nu do kanro vau fa lo nu do zukte lo se stidi be la kevin
rows.d: It can be dangerous for your health to do what Kevin suggested.

rows.w: do jai se ckape fai lo ka co'a bilma
rows.d: You are at risk of getting ill.

rows.w: pa pendo pu ckasu mi lo ka cadzu tai ma kau vau lo ka cusku lo mabla
rows.d: A friend mocked at the manner I walk by saying bad words.

rows.w: lo mamta be mi pu ckeji lo nu mi tarti ma kau vau loi prenu
rows.d: My mother was ashamed in front of the crowd of my conduct.

rows.w: ti ckiku lo xunre vorme i ma ckiku lo jaspu be do
rows.d: What is the password to your account?

rows.w: lo ka mitre ma kau cu ckilu lo ka te sepli ma kau ma kau
rows.d: Metric scale measures the distance between two points.

rows.w: mi na jimpe lo te ckini be lo panci bei lo se vecnu be fi do
rows.d: I don't understand the relation between the smell and your purchases.

rows.w: ti'e lo sance cu ckini lo barda mabru lo ka ce'u cupra ce'u fau lo nu ri pagre ti
rows.d: They say the sound is related to a large mammal that produces it while passing here.

rows.w: lo nu da'i mi pu zvati la nipon cu ckini fi no da
rows.d: The fact that I was in Japan is totally irrelevant.

rows.w: mi ckire do lo ka sidju mi
rows.d: Thank you for helping me.

rows.w: ckire fi lo balvi
rows.d: Thanks in advance.

rows.w: ti ckule lo bu'u gugde lo ve mikce lo citno tadni
rows.d: This is a medical school serving in this area teaching therapy methods to young students.

rows.w: mi ve ckule fi lo ralju
rows.d: I'm in primary school.

rows.w: xu lo tsiju be ti noi ckunu cu kukte
rows.d: Are pine nuts of this conifer tasty?

rows.w: lo zgike cu cladu lo bu'u kumfa ku ji'a
rows.d: The music is loud even when you are in this room.

rows.w: la tom cu clani lo ka sraji
rows.d: Tom is tall.

rows.w: la alis cu clani lo ka sraji
rows.d: Alice is tall.

rows.w: la maris cu clani lo ka sraji
rows.d: Mary is tall.

rows.w: lo cmana cu clani
rows.d: The mountain is high.

rows.w: lo nu penmi pu clani lo ka se ditcu
rows.d: The meeting was long.

rows.w: mi claxu lo ka djica lo ka citka
rows.d: I lack the desire to eat.

rows.w: si'au do claxu lo ka cinmo da
rows.d: Looks like you lack any emotions.

rows.w: mi claxu su'o penbi
rows.d: I don't have a pen.

rows.w: ti clika fi lo rokci
rows.d: This is moss growing on rocks.

rows.w: lo nu la alis cu cliva lo briju pu clira lo se sruma be mi
rows.d: Alice leaving the office was early according to my assumption.

rows.w: do pu na clite lo ka cusku lo se du'u lo ctuca na drani
rows.d: You wasn't polite in saying that the teacher isn't right.

rows.w: ra pu cliva lo kumfa pa canko
rows.d: He left the room via a window.

rows.w: ko jai se torni lo skori ja'e lo nu ri clupa
rows.d: Twist the rope into a loop.

rows.w: mi tadni lo cmaci be lo klani
rows.d: I study arithmetic (mathematics of quantity).

rows.w: lo nu penmi ba cmalu lo ka ditcu
rows.d: The meeting will be short in duration.

rows.w: lo cukta cu cmalu lo ka jai vajni
rows.d: The book is of little importance.

rows.w: so'i da cmana lo bu'u tumla
rows.d: This land has a lot of mountains.

rows.w: zo ka cmavo ma'oi nu
rows.d: {ka} is a grammatical particle of class "NU" (clause prefix)

rows.w: ma jetnu cmene do
rows.d: What is your real name?

rows.w: mi se cmene zo gleki
rows.d: My name is Gleki.

rows.w: lo bruna be mi mi te cmene zo ractu
rows.d: My brother calls me "Rabbit"

rows.w: ra pu co'a cmila
rows.d: She started laughing.

rows.w: mi cmima pa kamni pe lo gugde
rows.d: I am a member of a state committee.

rows.w: lo prenu pu cmoni zo a lo ka gleki
rows.d: The person uttered "A!" expressing his happiness.

rows.w: lo ki'o--gra be li ci cu cnano lo ka se junta vau lo ca zi jbena
rows.d: 3 kilograms is a normal weight of newborns.

rows.w: lo cnebo be lo za'u vi ninmu cu clani
rows.d: These women have long necks.

rows.w: mi pu cnemu lo gerku lo ka bevri lo grana vau lo ka te cpacu lo sakta lo gerku
rows.d: I rewarded the dog for bringing the stick by giving it sugar.

rows.w: lo kerfa cu cnici lo ka se ganzu fi lo carmi
rows.d: The hair is neat in being organized into a shining part.
